attributes.additional_details:
Stephen Sutton, who died today, was a young man of  Great courage & inspiration who raised over £3million for Teenage Cancer Charities.

I feel that there should be a National Holiday in his honour where the citizens of Great Britain are encouraged to raise funds, support or give their time on that day to charities either local or national.

It should be named in Stephen's memory as he deserves to be recognised for his amazing attitude in his all too short life
